TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRegistrationHelper

summary.span: 在 COM+ 目录中安装并配置程序集。

span.span: Installs and configures assemblies in the COM+ catalog.

MemberSignature.Value: public void InstallAssembly (string assembly, out string application, out string tlb, System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags installFlags);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstallAssembly([in]string assembly, [out] string& application, [out] string& tlb, [in]valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags installFlags) cil managed
Public Sub InstallAssembly (assembly As String, ByRef application As String, ByRef tlb As String, installFlags As InstallationFlags)

public: void InstallAssembly(System::String ^ assembly, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % application, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % tlb, System::EnterpriseServices::InstallationFlags installFlags);

param.name: assembly
param.span: 作为文件的程序集名称或者全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中的程序集的强名称。

span.span: The assembly name as a file or the strong name of an assembly in the global assembly cache (GAC).

param.name: application
param.span: 如果确实是该设置，则基于程序集的名称或 特性自动生成应用程序的名称。

span.span: If it is, the name of the application is automatically generated based on the name of the assembly or the attribute.

param.span: 如果应用程序包含 特性，则此特性优先。

span.span: If the application contains an attribute, the attribute takes precedence.

param.name: tlb
param.span: 输出类型库 (TLB) 文件的名称；如果应由注册帮助器生成该名称，则为包含 的字符串。

span.span: The name of the output type library (TLB) file, or a string containing if the registration helper is expected to generate the name.

param.span: 在调用完成后，所用的实际名称将放置在该参数中。

span.span: On call completion, the actual name used is placed in the parameter.

param.name: installFlags
param.span: 在枚举中指定的安装选项。

span.span: The installation options specified in the enumeration.

summary.span: 将程序集安装到 COM+ 目录中。

span.span: Installs the assembly into the COM+ catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法要求调用方可以在本地计算机上具有管理权限。This method requires the caller to have administrative privileges on the local computer.

MemberSignature.Value: public void UninstallAssembly (string assembly, string application);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UninstallAssembly([in]string assembly, [in]string application) cil managed
Public Sub UninstallAssembly (assembly As String, application As String)
public: void UninstallAssembly(System::String ^ assembly, System::String ^ application);

param.name: assembly
param.span: 作为文件的程序集名称或者全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中的程序集的强名称。

span.span: The assembly name as a file or the strong name of an assembly in the global assembly cache (GAC).
The name of the COM+ application.

summary.span: 从 COM+ 目录卸载程序集。

span.span: Uninstalls the assembly from the COM+ catalog.
